name: MEDICOS ESTABLISHMENT FOR DEVELOPMENT OF INTEGRATED CARE SOCIETY
briefDescription: MEDICS (MEDICOS ESTABLISHMENT FOR DEVELOPMENT OF INTEGRATED CARE SOCIETY) NON PROFITABLE,CHARITABLE ORGANISATION OF DOCTORS OF DIFFERENT SPECIALTY WORKING FOR COMMUNITY HEALTH SERVICE FOR ECONOMICALLY BACKWARD STRATA.ORGANISATION IS WORKING FOR LAST 7 YEARS ORGANISED MULTIPLE HEALTH CAMP , AIDS AWARENESS ,ANTI TOBACCO MOVEMENT , CANCER AWARENESS AND SCREENING FOR BREAST CANCER .EYE CAMP WITH FREE CATARACT SURGERY AND FREE GLASSES TO NEEDY PEOPLE . OUR TEAM IS COMMITTED FOR ALL HEALTH ISSUE WITH COMPETENT TEAM OF 50 .FOR LAST 1 YEAR ORGANISATION FOCUSING CANCER AWARENESS  AS CANCER HAS BECOME SECOND LEADING CAUSE OF DEATH AFTER CARDIAC ARREST IN INDIA AND UNNOTICED AS FEMALE ARE RELATIVE VISIT LESS TO HEALTH CENTERS WE VISIT THERE PLACE.
